publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4394 Margaret Jamieson: 24 Hour Noise Helpline for Ayrshireâ€”That the Parliament congratulates East, North and South Ayrshire councils on the launch of the 24-hour noise helpline, made possible by funding from the Scottish Executive, for residents of Ayrshire who experience noise disorder.
S2M-4394 24 Hour Noise Helpline for Ayrshire (lodged on 12 May 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4394 24 Hour Noise Helpline for Ayrshire (lodged on 12 May 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-4394 24 Hour Noise Helpline for Ayrshire (lodged on 12 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*
